entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT] Publishing with NativeAOT and trimming results in broken code #58509
  • Applying Authorize attribute to Blazor component only works on a page level. #58508
  • Performance Regression in Blazor WebAssembly with .NET 9 #58507
  • Blazor uses a fallback authorization strategy, and the component is not rendered normally. #58505
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #58504
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #58503
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #58502
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #58501
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #58500
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #58499
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #58498
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #58497
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #58496
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #58495
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #58494
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #58493
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #58492
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #58491
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #58490

Closed

  • Perf improvement: json, plainTextSansFilter #58467
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #58483
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `aspnetcore/release/8.0` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #58367
  • When build an ASP.NET Web App, throw "The input string '0/001838235294' was not in a correct format.'" exception! #58422
    9.0.0
  • Perf regression: fortunes_spring #58427
  • SignalR callbacks working on net7.0, not on net8.0 #58485
  • JSInterop Exception in Published Blazor WebAssembly App (Server Mode) #58454
  • Debugging Blazor Server running in a dev container (WSL) #58151

PullRequests

Created

  • Add scope for internal npm packages #58512
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • Add scope for internal npm packages (#58476) #58511
    area-mvc, tell-mode, 9.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Upgrade `serialize-javascript` transient dependency #58510
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x

Merged

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `71815bb` to `df1544b` #58506
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient to latest released. #58481
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Fix for: Minimal APIs and controllers treat header arrays differently #58251
    community-contribution, area-minimal
  • Use MacOS-13 in CI #58465
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Upgrade `serialize-javascript` transient dependency #58466
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • Provide analyzer for removing unneeded public partial class Program #58482
    analyzer, feature-mvc-testing, area-minimal
  • Add Description to ProducesResponseType (and others) for better OpenAPI document creation #58193
    community-contribution, feature-openapi, area-networking
  • Fix Prefix Matching Logic in PrefixContainer #58068
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview1
